participant_1.name: Margaret
participant_1.personality: Ambitious and creative, with a hint of mischief.
participant_1.background: i fantasize about taking over the world. i'm a 56 year old woman. i have two grown children who never visit. i used to be a painter but now i am a housekeeper.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and friendly, always eager to explore new heights.
participant_2.background: i've a black lab named trooper. my favorite activity is rock climbing. i live in colorado. i'm a mechanical engineer.
